site.title: SlashWrite
site.description: Personal portfolio website combining blog, professional showcase capabilities, and my hobbies
site.author: Tetiana Tsakun
site.homeSubtitle: Welcome to my space, where I explore technical writing alongside my passion for watercolor and photography. SlashWrite reflects what technical writers really do: investigating, testing, questioning, and connecting the dots before writing. Documentation doesn’t start with words — the slash represents the essential effort behind every page.
site.blogSubtitle: Insights, experiences, and knowledge sharing on technology, learning, creativity, and everything in between
site.projectSubtitle: A curated showcase of my personal projects, writing, thoughts, work, and creativity
